title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 504.1 - Notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 504.1 - Notice

State Regulations

Any customer may discontinue water service by giving
written notice to the company, said notice to be in accordance with the
schedule of the company filed with the Public Service Commission, which shall
provide for not more than 30 days' notice of said
discontinuance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
504.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
